document.full_text: a crucial new phase of portugal's bailout negotiations began under a cloud on monday after an anti-euro party in finland that has vowed to derail the pending rescue scored strong gains in an election.
document.title: portugal aid talks enter key phase under finnish cloud
lines_and_colors: a crucial new phase of portugal's bailout negotiations began under a cloud on monday after an anti-euro party in finland that has vowed to derail the pending rescue scored strong gains in an election.
